segments.text: Don ’ t you have air-conditioning in your apartment ? It ’ s sweltering here !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , there is air-conditioning . Did you see that window air conditioner there ? The problem is that the window unit isn ’ t powerful enough .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I ’ m going to move out anyway . The new apartment has central air-conditioning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You should have moved out long , long ago .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I had to wait until the lease expired . So ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So how can you stand the heat ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I open the windows and ... and I ’ Ve got an electric fan ere . It helps a little .
segments.speaker: S2
